one-piece.title: One Piece Costumes
one-piece.description: Dress up as your favorite pirates from the Grand Line!

products.name: Monkey D. Luffy Costume
products.description: Complete Luffy costume with authentic straw hat, red vest, and blue shorts. Perfect for any pirate adventure!

products.name: Roronoa Zoro Swordsman Outfit
products.description: Zoro's iconic green haramaki with three sword replica set. Become the world's greatest swordsman!

products.name: Sanji Black Leg Cook Uniform
products.description: Sanji's elegant black suit with blonde wig and signature eyebrow. Cook up some trouble in style!

products.name: Nami Navigator Costume
products.description: Nami's orange bikini top and shorts with weather staff replica. Navigate your way to the best costume!

naruto.title: Naruto Costumes
naruto.description: Become a ninja from the Hidden Leaf Village!

products.name: Naruto Uzumaki Sage Mode
products.description: Naruto's iconic orange jumpsuit with Konoha headband and sage mode accessories. Believe it!

products.name: Sasuke Uchiha Akatsuki Cloak
products.description: Sasuke's Akatsuki cloak with sharingan contacts and sword. Avenger style perfected!

products.name: Kakashi Hatake Jonin Uniform
products.description: Kakashi's jonin uniform with mask, sharingan eye, and headband. Copy ninja style!

attack-on-titan.title: Attack on Titan Costumes
attack-on-titan.description: Join the Survey Corps and fight against the Titans!

products.name: Levi Ackerman Uniform
products.description: Levi's Survey Corps uniform with ODM gear replica and cape. Humanity's strongest soldier!

products.name: Eren Yeager Cosplay Costume
products.description: Eren's final season uniform with determined expression wig. Fight for freedom!

demon-slayer.title: Demon Slayer Costumes
demon-slayer.description: Join the Demon Slayer Corps and master Breathing Techniques!

products.name: Tanjiro Kamado Uniform
products.description: Tanjiro's checkered haori with nichirin sword replica. Water Breathing ready!

products.name: Nezuko Kamado Demon Form
products.description: Nezuko's kimono with bamboo muzzle and demon contacts. Protect your family!

my-hero-academia.title: My Hero Academia Costumes
my-hero-academia.description: Become a hero from UA High School!

products.name: Izuku Midoriya Hero Costume
products.description: Deku's green hero costume with mask and accessories. Plus Ultra!

products.name: Katsuki Bakugo Cosplay Costume
products.description: Bakugo's explosive hero costume with grenade gauntlets. The future number one hero!

jujutsu-kaisen.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Costumes
jujutsu-kaisen.description: Master cursed energy and become a Jujutsu Sorcerer!

products.name: Yuji Itadori Jujutsu Costume
products.description: Yuji's Jujutsu High uniform with pink hair. Eat this finger and become the vessel!

products.name: Gojo Satoru Blindfold Style
products.description: Gojo's iconic blindfold look with white hair and Jujutsu High uniform. The strongest sorcerer!
